item.title: Introduce the Observer pattern and its use cases
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Problem Imagine that you have two types of objects: a Customer and a Store. The customer is very interested in a particular brand of product (say, it’s a new model of the iPhone) which should become available in the store very soon.
